title: My Son's Happier Out of Day Care
description:
The final Call of the Day episode of the year!! After hearing Dr. Laura's message about the negative effects of daycare, Todd changed his hours to spend more time with his son and says he sees huge improvements. - Dr. Laura: "It makes a big difference when kids are raised by people who love them all day."

What's something you could change that would improve your child's life? Email me your thoughts at: drlaura@drlaura.com 

To participate on the radio program; call 1-800-Dr-Laura / 1-800-375-2872 or make an appointment - https://www.drlaura.com/make-an-appointment.
